Just Launched

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Some questions about Shortcut are asked frequently. We've answered the most frequent of those frequent questions below.

For these plans, we use metered billing, which means we charge you per user, per month during your yearly billing cycle.

Shortcut does not offer pro-rated refunds for cancelled subscriptions.

To add a credit card, go to **Settings \> Workspace \> Billing**, and update your billing information in the Card section. It’s always a good idea to review and update your billing contact information while you’re there.

If you have 10 or fewer users when the trial ends, you can simply use Shortcut for free or manually choose one of our paid plans to get access to the features included within it. If you have more than 10 users and want to continue using Shortcut after your trial ends, subscribe to one of our paid plans.

Nope! You are welcome to add a credit card at any time, but you won’t be charged until your 14-day Trial is over.

Anything! The Shortcut Trial is meant to give you an opportunity to truly test Shortcut’s features and to build processes that work for your team. You’ll have full access to Shortcut as a robust tool, including (but definitely not limited to): an Organization with unlimited [Workspaces](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001083483) and [user management](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001083483?_gl=1*1k2kkh0*_ga*ODIwMDY2MjQxLjE2Njc5NzIwMDk.*_ga_6R5BRMXXTM*MTY2OTM0Njk1Mi4xOS4wLjE2NjkzNDY5NTIuMC4wLjA.), unlimited [Observer users](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000413023), [our API](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/207696406), and [outgoing webhooks](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005093963). Feel free to experiment with using Teams, Epics and Objectives, Stories, Labels, and Custom Workflows together to create a project management environment unique and useful to your team.

![Image 201](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6784ef8df976cd8e20df35d5/6784ef8df976cd8e20df370a_program%20icon%20.svg)

But wait, there’s more....
--------------------------

Shortcut is honored to extend a full membership at no cost to eligible Nonprofit organizations as thanks for the hard work.

![Image 202: An Engineer at a computer working in a development environment.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6784ef8df976cd8e20df35d5/6784ef8df976cd8e20df3761_mask%20image.avif)

### The Shortcut Nonprofit Plan

Shortcut is free for qualifying nonprofits. Thank you for the hard work your team does to make the world a better place.

### The Shortcut Startup Program

Get 12 months free if your startup has fewer than 50 employees. Open to all startups, regardless of VC-fund or accelerator affiliation.

![Image 203: A design team reviewing progress](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6784ef8df976cd8e20df35d5/6784ef8df976cd8e20df3716_Frame%201802088.avif)

Shortcut offers a free plan for teams of up to ten people. Upgrade to a paid plan for unlimited everything, additional features and SSO.

Just Launched

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Some questions about Shortcut are asked frequently. We've answered the most frequent of those frequent questions below.

For these plans, we use metered billing, which means we charge you per user, per month during your yearly billing cycle.

Shortcut does not offer pro-rated refunds for cancelled subscriptions.

To add a credit card, go to **Settings \> Workspace \> Billing**, and update your billing information in the Card section. It’s always a good idea to review and update your billing contact information while you’re there.

If you have 10 or fewer users when the trial ends, you can simply use Shortcut for free or manually choose one of our paid plans to get access to the features included within it. If you have more than 10 users and want to continue using Shortcut after your trial ends, subscribe to one of our paid plans.

Nope! You are welcome to add a credit card at any time, but you won’t be charged until your 14-day Trial is over.

Anything! The Shortcut Trial is meant to give you an opportunity to truly test Shortcut’s features and to build processes that work for your team. You’ll have full access to Shortcut as a robust tool, including (but definitely not limited to): an Organization with unlimited [Workspaces](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001083483) and [user management](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001083483?_gl=1*1k2kkh0*_ga*ODIwMDY2MjQxLjE2Njc5NzIwMDk.*_ga_6R5BRMXXTM*MTY2OTM0Njk1Mi4xOS4wLjE2NjkzNDY5NTIuMC4wLjA.), unlimited [Observer users](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000413023), [our API](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/207696406), and [outgoing webhooks](https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005093963). Feel free to experiment with using Teams, Epics and Objectives, Stories, Labels, and Custom Workflows together to create a project management environment unique and useful to your team.

![Image 201](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6784ef8df976cd8e20df35d5/6784ef8df976cd8e20df370a_program%20icon%20.svg)

### The Shortcut Nonprofit Plan

Shortcut is free for qualifying nonprofits. Thank you for the hard work your team does to make the world a better place.

### The Shortcut Startup Program

Get 12 months free if your startup has fewer than 50 employees. Open to all startups, regardless of VC-fund or accelerator affiliation.

Shortcut offers a free plan for teams of up to ten people. Upgrade to a paid plan for unlimited everything, additional features and SSO.
